short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TIG Gmail to Pika CMS Chrome Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gmail to Pika integrates Gmail with the Pika CMS, so users can automatically copy Gmail messages and attachments directly over to a Pika case record.

Gmail to Pika is a custom extension designed to work with the Pika case management system, an open source, PHP-based client-oriented CMS widely used within the legal aid and non-profit communities. By design it simplifies the everyday task of copying the content of email messages and email attachments over to individual client case records in Pika.

Note: Before using the extension, your organization will need to install Pika-specific files that enable Gmail to share data with Pika. All required files and installation instructions are available at the “TIG Google Apps Integration” GitHub site here: https://github.com/mcplusa/TIG-Google-Apps-Integration
